meanings.definition: To smile more than someone else.
meanings.sent1: She always outsmiles her friends in photos.
meanings.sent2: He outsmiles everyone in the room with his bright smile.
meanings.sent3: The little girl outsmiles her teddy bear in every picture they take together.
meanings.sent4: Her happiness outsmiles the gloomy weather outside.
meanings.sent5: His grin outsmiles the sun on a summer day.

meanings.sent1: The cheerful baby outsmiles all the other babies at the daycare.
meanings.sent2: Even on a bad day, she manages to outsmile everyone around her.
meanings.sent3: The clown outsmiles the audience with his silly antics.
meanings.sent4: Her joy outsmiles any sadness that tries to bring her down.
meanings.sent5: His laughter outsmiles the sound of rain on the roof.
